name: DomainTools
description: Use DomainTools to query various current and historical data regarding domain names, domain registration and IPs

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity
Evaluates the risk of a given domain
Search for new domains containing a word
actions.verbose: If the days_back parameter is not set, the data for the current day is returned, else data of the particular day in the past is retrieved.

query.description: Word to look for in a domain name

days_back.description: Number of days back to search for (1-6)

actions.description: Find IPs that point to this domain and other domain names that share the same IP
Find domain names that share an IP

example_values: No Reverse IP data found for that IP / domain name.

actions.description: Find domains with an email in their Whois record

count_only.description: Only return count of matched records

actions.description: Obtain changes to registrar, IP, etc

example_values: Ip history count: 280, Registrar history count: 3, Nameserver history count: 2
Ip history count: 5, Registrar history count: 1, Nameserver history count: 2
Ip history count: 3, Registrar history count: 2, Nameserver history count: 10
